snippet: Prime Minister Kamal el-Ganzouri, chosen by the military to lead the country, has had tragicomic dealings with the news media.
abstract: Egypt's military appointed Prime Min Kamal el-Ganzouri in a bid to restore the flagging trust in its authority, but many Egyptians target Ganzouri as a foil for humor and find him a subject of puzzlement.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Kamal el-Ganzouri, chosen by the military to lead the country, has had tragicomic dealings with the news media.

headline.main: Egypt Leader’s Credibility Stumbles on His Words
headline.print_headline: Egypt Leader’s Credibility Stumbles on His Words
